meanings.definition: To gather together in one place for a common purpose.
meanings.sent1: The students were assembling in the gym for the school assembly.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys assembling puzzles with her family on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels were assembling for a secret nut-sharing meeting.
meanings.sent4: The stars were assembling in the night sky, creating a breathtaking view.
meanings.sent5: Assembling all the ingredients, she began to bake a delicious cake.

meanings.definition: To put together parts or pieces to create a whole.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic was assembling the engine of the car carefully.
meanings.sent2: He was assembling a model airplane from a kit.
meanings.sent3: The robots were assembling a giant sandwich in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: She was assembling her thoughts like pieces of a puzzle before speaking.
meanings.sent5: Assembling the furniture took longer than expected due to missing screws.

meanings.definition: The act of coming together or gathering in one place.
meanings.sent1: The assembling of friends at the park was a joyful sight.
meanings.sent2: The annual family reunion was a grand assembling of relatives.
meanings.sent3: The assembling of clouds in the sky looked like a fluffy pillow fight.
meanings.sent4: The assembling of colors in the painting created a beautiful masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The assembling of ingredients in the recipe made a delicious dish.
